mapper.insert: insert into commodity (com_id, discount_id, ca_id, fe_id, com_name, com_price, com_state, com_place, com_stock, com_weight, inDate, outDate, discounted_price) value (#{com_id}, #{discount_id}, #{ca_id}, #{fe_id}, #{com_name}, #{com_price}, #{com_state}, #{com_place}, #{com_stock}, #{com_weight}, #{inDate}, #{outDate}, #{discounted_price})
mapper.select: select * from commodity order by discounted_price asc
